mapper.select: select a.* from y23_goods_collect a where a.is_delete=0 order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into y23_goods_collect
id,
userId,
goodsId,
is_delete, create_time, modify_time
#{id},
#{userId},
#{goodsId},
0, now(), now()
mapper.update:
update y23_goods_collect
userId = #{userId},
goodsId = #{goodsId},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
create_time = #{createTime},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
where id = #{id}
